广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐排行榜、新闻、照片和视频2023 年 11 月 13 日星期一 19:58:43 +0000 en-US每小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.2.3 以《火影忍者》主题曲而闻名的生物盛将《Ureshikute/Tokimeki》称为对他们新阵容的肯定：采访https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/ikimonogakari-interview-ureshikute-tokimeki-single-lineup-1235470804/Katie Atkinson Mon, 13 Nov 2023 19:51:00 +0000 MusicMusic NewsBillboard JapanGlobalJapan https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235470804 Billboard JAPAN spoke to Mizuno and Yoshioka about the double A-side single.

负责《火影忍者》主题曲《Blue Bird》的日本乐队Ikimonogakari现在以由水野芳树和吉冈清惠组成的二人组开启了新的篇章，并发行了最新的双 A 面单曲《Ureshikute/Tokimeki》。

Billboard JAPAN 就这首单曲与水野和吉冈进行了交谈，其中包含《Ureshikute》（电影《光之美少女 All Stars F》的主题曲，由茑谷浩一担任音响制作）和《Tokimeki》（光之美少女 20 周年纪念曲和片头曲）电视动画《希望之力 – Otona Pretty Cure '23》 ，由岛田政典负责音响制作）。

这是你们成为二人组后的第一首单曲。电影《光之美少女 All Stars F 》主题曲《Ureshikute 》和电视动画《光之美少女》20周年纪念曲兼片头曲《Tokimeki》是双A面歌曲。 23.听说《心跳》是你先写的？

美津浓：是这样的。光之美少女即将庆祝成立 20 周年，我们很荣幸他们联系我们并邀请我们写一首纪念歌曲。我想这是去年夏天的事了。看过《光之美少女》第一季的人现在都在20多岁或30多岁。光之美少女们表示，他们希望这首歌能够让光之美少女再次鼓励和振奋听众，无论他们生活在哪里，并重申他们的价值。我们也感受到了与这个主题的联系。我们乐队的结构发生了变化，我们自己出发了，我们周围的环境也发生了变化。我们开始更加关注吉冈作为我们歌手的角色，我们想制作一首重申我们自己的新风格的歌曲。

吉冈：是的，当我唱这首歌的时候，我真的很喜欢它。当然，这首歌是我们为光之美少女20周年而写的，但其中有很多内容与我们自己的情况产生共鸣。当我们进入录制过程时，我正准备生孩子。在这方面，就像水野说的那样，这感觉像是一首自我肯定的歌，我认为这在我的声调中体现出来了。这首歌无论你的处境如何，都能给你带来乐观的感觉，所以我真心地投入了我的心。

前两行“世界现在闪闪发光/因为我决定它会闪闪发光”，真是自我肯定。

美津浓：谢谢。我认为随着社交媒体的传播，人们正在根据从其他人那里听到的信息来决定自己的价值观。 “这很好，因为人们说它很好”或者“其他人正在攻击这个人，所以我也这样做也没关系。”我觉得我们生活在一个很难为自己决定价值观并书写自己人生故事的世界。世界上发生了很多事情，人们都在挣扎，所以我想把这首歌做成一首传达“我认为没关系，所以就是这样”的信息的歌曲。

这是否反映了现代社会的基调？

美津浓：我想如果用正式的话来说，是的（笑）。 《光之美少女》刚出的时候，女主角有打斗场面的动漫还不是很多。我认为创作者想要表达那种强大的活力感。

声音也确实充满活力。岛田正则负责声音制作，对吧？

Mizuno：我们想让声音既光芒四射又充满力量。岛田并不是那种一丝不苟的类型，而是建立了坚实的声音，同时也采取了类似乐队的声音制作方法。我们知道这首歌会得到岛田的大力支持。

我懂了。 《Ureshikute》的声音制作由茑谷浩一负责。这首歌的编曲令人惊叹。

美津浓：对啊。当演示从茑屋送来时，我们开始担心录音要花多少钱（笑）。

吉冈：（笑）我认为录音中的音乐家比我们迄今为止录制的任何歌曲都要多。好像是60岁，不是吗？

美津浓：是的。我们的目标是从创作一开始就让它成为一首真正雄伟的歌曲。我们的声音概念有点像约翰·威廉姆斯的洛杉矶奥运会宣传曲。电影中出现了很多光之美少女的角色，所以我们想要一个他们所有声音齐声的部分。

吉冈：在第一个演示中，只有水野弹钢琴，我唱歌，但即使在那个阶段，这种感觉也确实存在，我心里想“这确实是一首很棒的歌曲”。歌曲快结束时，我用尽全力唱着。我想我们从来没有唱过这样的旋律。歌词中关于互相接受的内容是完美的搭配。互相接受，同时尊重有些事情你永远不会真正理解。这首歌很欢快，但也肯定有敏感的一面。

水野：我在写这首歌之前通读了电影剧本。我画出了故事的关键部分（并将它们反映在歌词中）。正如吉冈所说，这是要互相接受，但这并不是一件容易的事。每个人都有自己的是非观念，依赖别人需要勇气。我想尝试以一种有趣而温和的方式表达这一点。

这首歌中有一句话给人留下了深刻的印象：“尊重你无法理解的差异/你不需要都一样。”

水野：你们不需要团结一致；你们每个人都可以走自己的路，与他人一起应对问题和挑战。我们想要制作一首即使在《光之美少女》背景之外仍能传达这种感觉的歌曲。

这是一首很长的歌，长达六分钟多。

美津浓：原来是很长（笑）。它从副歌开始，然后是坚实的主歌和桥段，然后是转调，然后是第二副副歌。一切都已经有了（笑）。

它具有日本流行歌曲的所有独特特征。您认为日本流行音乐为何如此有趣和有吸引力？

水野：我认为这取决于歌曲的信息量。我认为日本流行音乐的特点之一是固定形式中的复杂性。有很多歌曲都有主歌、桥段、副歌结构，而且和弦进行也很复杂。我觉得那是因为节奏并不是歌曲的基础。此外，旋律占主导地位。歌唱是歌曲的核心。吉冈也一直努力确保她的元音清晰、旋律清晰。

吉冈：对。

水野：我认为，日本流行音乐对于海外听众来说是独一无二的，因为他们把重点放在歌唱上，而不是把歌曲固定在节奏上。此外，J-Pop 还对从海外进口的歌曲进行本地化。就好像它结合了不同的外部元素并以独特的方式开发它们。这是日本文化的迷人之处之一。

好点子。这就像日本文化本身。

吉冈：在我们乐队的整个职业生涯中，Ikimonogakari 一直相信这种音乐。我一直听日本流行音乐，这些年来它塑造了我。所以我其实很好奇海外听众的看法（笑）。我希望他们发现它是独一无二的。

《青鸟》（电视动画《火影忍者：疾风传》的片头曲）是深受海外听众喜爱的生物语歌曲之一。

水野：我不断收到在海外听过的人的来信。一位去维也纳旅行的熟人告诉我，他们在一家咖啡店里听到了《蓝鸟》的演奏。海外音乐人翻唱了这首歌，一位女孩在中国选秀节目上演唱了这首歌，让观众非常兴奋。

吉冈：我初中的一个同学给我发了一封电子邮件，说他在拉丁美洲听《蓝鸟》，一名当地学生说“我知道那首歌”。我们在 Instagram 上也有很多国际粉丝。

美津浓：是的。我收到了一位海外 DJ 的私信，希望获得我混音“Blue Bird”的许可，所以我给了他们获得许可的联系方式（笑）。前年，我们玩了bilibili（中国视频流媒体服务）组织的活动（Bilibili Macro Link 2021），《蓝鸟》的反响很大。我们还收到了更多海外比赛的邀请。

您想与更多的海外听众分享您的音乐吗？

美津浓：当然。我已经这么说了很长时间了，但我希望 J-Pop 能够像这样输出——作为 J-Pop。

那么最好的事情是如果人们按原样听它，带有日语歌词和日语歌曲结构？

美津浓：是这样的。我认为这将是最成功的方法。

吉冈：我很高兴国外的人们能够倾听。当我们出道时，我从未想过我们会有海外听众。还是很让人惊讶（笑）。

— Tomoyuki Mori 的采访首次出现在 Billboard Japan 上

; 2023 年拉丁格莱美奖预测：谁将赢得最高荣誉？ https://www.billboard.com/music/latin/latin-grammy-awards-2023-predictions-1235470207/Sigal Ratner-Arias Mon, 13 Nov 2023 19:49:10 +0000 LatinMusicBBLatinLatin Grammys https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235470207 Billboard 的拉丁语和西班牙语编辑分析了谁将（并且应该）在主要四个类别中获胜。;

谁将在 2023 年拉丁格莱美颁奖典礼上度过一个重要的夜晚？每年，公告牌都会对主要类别（年度歌曲、年度唱片、年度专辑和最佳新人）的获胜者和应该获胜者进行分析。

今年，在周四（11 月 16 日）拉丁格莱美颁奖典礼之前，我们召集了拉丁编辑团队，开始了热烈的讨论，并根据市场和过去的投票行为（而非认可）做出了有根据的猜测。我们的参与者是Leila Cobo ， Billboard拉丁语/西班牙语首席内容官； Jessica Roiz ，拉丁语助理编辑； Griselda Flores ，资深拉丁作家； Ingrid Fajardo ，社交媒体经理兼拉丁文特约撰稿人； Sigal Ratner-Arias ，Billboard Español副主编；以及《Billboard Español 》副主编伊莎贝拉·雷戈萨 (Isabela Raygoza) 。

一年一度的拉丁格莱美颁奖典礼首次在美国境外举行，将于 11 月 16 日在西班牙塞维利亚会议展览中心通过 Univision 播出，美国东部时间晚上 8 点、美国 UniMás 和 Galavisión 播出，晚上 10 点：西班牙中部时间下午 30 点，西班牙广播电视公司 (RTVE) 播出。丹娜·保拉 (Danna Paola) 、塞巴斯蒂安·亚特拉 (Sebastián Yatra )、罗塞琳·桑切斯 (Roselyn Sánchez) 和帕斯·维加 (Paz Vega) 将担任联合主持人。

有关的

埃德加·巴雷拉 (Edgar Barrera) 名列 2023 年拉丁格莱美提名者完整名单

2023年11月13日

以下是我们的预测：

年度纪录

克里斯蒂娜·阿奎莱拉《No Es Que Te Extrañe》

《Carretera y Manta》，巴勃罗·阿尔沃兰

保拉·阿里纳斯 (Paula Arenas) 与赫苏斯·纳瓦罗 (Jesús Navarro) 合作的《Déjame Llorarte》

“夏奇拉：Bzrp 音乐会议，卷。 53”，由夏奇拉主演的 Bizarrap

“Si Tú Me Quieres”，丰塞卡和胡安·路易斯·格拉

“Mientras Me Curo Del Cora”，卡罗尔·G

《De Todas Las Flores》，娜塔莉亚·拉福卡德

“奥霍斯·马罗内斯”，套索

“La Fórmula”，Maluma 和 Marc Anthony

“德斯佩查”，罗莎莉亚

亚历杭德罗·桑斯 (Alejandro Sanz) 与丹尼·奥申 (Danny Ocean) 合作的《Correcaminos》

Griselda Flores：我认为夏奇拉和比扎拉普应该获胜并且将会获胜。 “夏奇拉：Bzrp 音乐会议，卷。 《53》是一首应该入选年度最佳唱片的歌曲的完美例子，因为这首歌向制作人致敬，而且 Bizarrap 现在非常热门。将他与今年表现出色的夏奇拉配对，他们获胜的机会就会增加一倍。他们是选民们耳熟能详的两个名字，正因为如此，也因为这首歌的制作无与伦比，所以它理应获胜。那场音乐会议在文化上也产生了巨大的影响——它无处不在！

Leila Cobo： Shakira Bizarrap 环节应该获胜。我认为 Bizarrap 制作这首歌曲的方式非常精湛——他为每位艺术家制作每首歌曲的方式也是如此，但他在这里所做的，就像引用她的老歌并参考抒情和音乐一样，是如此聪明的。他能够读懂她。这首歌有很多值得探索的地方，我认为从制作的角度来看，它做得非常出色。这是制作和歌曲创作同时完成的一个很好的例子——你几乎可以看到整个事情是在你眼前创作的。不过，我不确定它会赢。选民可能会选择克里斯蒂娜·阿奎莱拉的《No Es Que Te Extrañe》、巴勃罗·阿尔博兰的《Carretera y Manta》或丰塞卡和胡安·路易斯·格拉的《Si Tú Me Quieres》，这是一首优美的歌曲。

西格尔·拉特纳-阿里亚斯：我同意你的观点，莱拉。我觉得 Bizarrap 与 Shakira 合作的歌曲脱颖而出，因为无论是歌词还是组合方式，它在音乐上都非常不同且具有原创性。唱得非常好，每一个细节都非常完美。另一方面，我不知道它是否会获胜，因为它可能会去“Si Tú Me Quieres”，那是非常美丽的。我重新听了 Lasso 的“Ojos Marrones”，我认为它从头到尾都是完美的流行音乐，而且制作精美。那也是有机会的。

Isabela Raygoza：并不是要跟风，但 Shakira-Bizarrap 部分也是我的最爱，尽管我怀疑获胜者可能是 Natalia Lafourcade 的“De Todas Las Flores”。我认为这是一段非常美丽的录音。她是拉丁格莱美奖的宠儿，它被录制在模拟磁带上，并由法裔墨西哥制片人、一位出色的音乐家阿丹·佐杜洛夫斯基 (Adan Jodorowsky) 制作。现场乐器以及管弦乐的结合方式确实对我很有帮助。我预测这首歌会获胜，但我最喜欢的是 Bizarrap 和 Shakira 的演唱。

杰西卡·罗伊兹：我很高兴看到夏奇拉和比扎拉普接受这首歌，因为考虑到这首歌在今年年初发行时的力量有多大，它会发表​​一个声明。然而，这份清单上确实有其他我最喜欢的音乐，它们在音乐上让我更加着迷。 “La Formula”就是其中之一，因为它有非常好的旋律——这不是典型的萨尔萨歌曲，它有一些城市的味道。我觉得唱片学院也注意到了这一点，所以它才出现在名单上。但我也同意西格尔关于“Ojos Marrones”的观点。如果Lasso 拿走了我也不会生气。

英格丽德·法哈多：如果夏奇拉赢了那就太好了，但我觉得她也可能不会赢。我同意“Ojos Marrones”有很大的机会，但我最喜欢的是 Karol G 的“Mientras Me Curo del Cora”。他们用副歌创作这首歌的方式真的很感动我。这给制作增加了很多。

年度专辑

巴勃罗·阿尔沃兰·拉库塔·霍加

保拉·阿雷纳斯·西加斯

卡米洛·德·阿登特罗·帕·阿富拉

德西莫·夸尔托、安德烈斯·塞佩达

胡安内斯·维达·科蒂迪亚纳

Mañana Será Bonito，卡罗尔·G

德托达斯·拉斯·弗洛雷斯，娜塔莉亚·拉福卡德

演奏，瑞奇·马丁

EADDA9223 ,菲托·佩兹

卡洛斯·维韦斯·埃斯卡洛纳·努卡·塞·哈比亚·格拉巴多·阿西

拉特纳-阿里亚斯：娜塔莉亚在名单上，她是宠儿，并呈现了另一张专辑，声音经典，歌词深沉，民俗和诗意的声音。但 Karol 的Mañana Será Bonito呈现了一张非常现代且不拘一格的专辑，传达了鼓舞人心的赋权信息，它感动了很多人的心。这是年度最佳专辑，收录了夏奇拉 (Shakira) 的《Provenza》、《Mientras Me Curo del Cora》和《TQG》等歌曲。它应该获胜，并且希望它会获胜。

科博：我赞同所有这些。是的，拉丁格莱美奖可以通过授予女性来表达自己的观点，但也可以赋予[商业上]成功的事物以价值。但胡安斯或纳塔利娅·拉福卡德也可能获胜。

弗洛雷斯：我想说这些都是可靠的专辑——这是一个艰难的选择。我必须为我们的拉丁格莱美指南写这个类别，所以我听了所有提名的曲目，其中一些确实令人感动。 Paula Arenas 和 Andres Cepeda 各自的专辑非常华丽。但我确实不得不说， 《Mañana Será Bonito》是一张有意为之的专辑，也是一张创造历史的专辑，应该获胜，并且将会获胜。 Karol G 值得获得这样的认可。我支持她。

Fajardo： Karol 的专辑是一切的完美结合，它超级赋权，但以一种深情的方式：治愈自己的重要性。那张专辑让我感受到了所有的情感，但你并不总是能像这样与整张专辑联系起来。

Raygoza：其实我也很喜欢 Carlos Vives 的专辑。我知道这不是一个受欢迎的选择，但总的来说，它对拉丁音乐做出了美丽的贡献。在他继续为这一代人更新瓦莱纳托的同时，他确实复活了拉斐尔·埃斯卡洛纳的音乐，他在电视剧中演奏的著名音乐。他传递了对生活、音乐和制作的热情，我真的很喜欢他对埃斯卡洛纳独特的歌曲创作方式的尊重。歌词和音乐都很优美，它为拉丁流派提供了多样性。

罗伊兹：也许卡洛斯·维韦斯可以接受这个。他为他的所有项目投入了大量的努力和研究。他对自己的流派充满热情，这也反映在他的音乐中，所以我觉得他的辛勤工作将获得年度最佳专辑的回报。他付出了额外的努力来推出这些类型的专辑，就像他对Cumbiana所做的那样。但我也认为胡内斯的《Vida Cotidiana》可能会获胜，因为这是胡内斯的复出专辑。但 Karol G 的Mañana Será Bonito应该获胜。这不仅仅是卡罗尔对流派的尝试，它真实地展示了她的治愈过程，这让我们很多人与她一起治愈。

年度歌曲

“Acróstico”，Kevyn Mauricio Cruz Moreno、LEXUZ、Luis Fernando Ochoa 和 Shakira，作曲家 (Shakira)

“Amigos”，词曲作者 Pablo Alborán 和 Maria Becerra（Pablo Alborán 和 Maria Becerra 合作）

“De Todas Las Flores”，词曲作者娜塔莉亚·拉福卡德 (Natalia Lafourcade)

“Ella Baila Sola”，歌曲作者 Pedro Julian Tovar Oceguera（Eslabon Armado、Peso Pluma）

“NASA”，词曲作者埃德加·巴雷拉 (Edgar Barrera)、卡米洛 (Camilo) 和亚历杭德罗·桑斯 (Alejandro Sanz) (Camilo & Alejandro Sanz)

“Ojos Marrones”，歌曲作者 Luis Jiménez、Lasso 和 Agustín Zubillaga (Lasso)

“夏奇拉：Bzrp 音乐会议，卷。 53”，歌曲作者 Santiago Alvarado、Bizarrap、Kevyn Mauricio Cruz 和 Shakira（Bizarrap 收录于 Shakira）

“Si Tú Me Quieres”，歌曲作者 Fonseca、Yadam González 和 Yoel Henríquez（Fonseca 和 Juan Luis Guerra）

“TQG”，歌曲作者 Kevyn Mauricio Cruz、Karol G、Ovy On The Drums 和 Shakira（Karol G 与 Shakira 合作）

“un X100to”，Bad Bunny、Edgar Barrera、Marco Daniel Borrero 和 Andres Jael Correa Rios，歌曲作者（Grupo Frontera 以 Bad Bunny 为特色）

弗洛雷斯：我很想说“Ella Baila Sola”将会获胜，但我认为这作为年度唱片更有意义，因为声音如此令人耳目一新，它把墨西哥音乐的新风格推向了最前沿。 charchetas、trambones、tololoche。我不确定它是否有机会赢得年度歌曲。我的预测是“un x100to”将获胜，因为学院将希望认可一首墨西哥地方歌曲，并且有超级明星 Bad Bunny 和埃德加·巴雷拉 (Edgar Barrera) 作为词曲作者——他是今年提名最多的艺术家——我认为它可能需要奖项。

科博：这很难。我认为“Ella Baila Sola”可能获胜。所以它值得获胜。有一天，我和一位古巴司机一起乘坐优步，他有一张雷鬼音乐播放列表，突然播放了“Ella Baila Sola”。这首歌穿透了一切。这可能是唯一一首不仅仅存在于墨西哥地区播放列表中的墨西哥地区歌曲。我认为这首歌应该获胜，我希望如此。这是一颗宝石。如果没有，卡罗尔和夏奇拉的“TQG”可能会获胜。但如果他们想走格莱美之路，亚历杭德罗·桑斯和卡米洛的《NASA》可能会获奖。

Raygoza：我也同意“Ella Baila Sola”应该进入年度唱片类别。它真的能让你站起来。已经超越太多了这个类别对我来说是最困难的类别之一，因为有很多好的类别。我想提一下夏奇拉与 Bizarrap 的音乐表演。莱拉写了一篇很棒的文章，她剖析了歌词，以及以如此出色的方式谩骂某人是多么的前卫和坦率。毫无歉意的故事讲述与典型的分手歌曲有很大不同。歌曲创作总体上非常大胆，我认为学院授予这首歌奖项是非常规的，但我确实觉得它也体现了赢得这一类别的所有特征。然而，这不是我认为会获胜的歌曲。 Grupo Frontera 和 Bad Bunny 以令人难以置信的方式融合在一起，将这首歌变为现实。歌曲创作非常巧妙，我喜欢标题“un x100to”将爱情的持久力量与手机短暂的生命并置的方式。 Bad Bunny 演唱歌曲的方式天衣无缝。这是一首令人难以抗拒的坎比亚、北方歌曲。

Ratner-Arias：我很乐意看到这首歌获胜，但是，尽管这可能会让你感到惊讶，但在夏奇拉的所有三首歌曲中，最有可能赢得年度歌曲的是《Acróstico》。 ”这是最敏感、最脆弱的歌曲之一，不是出自哥伦比亚巨星之手，而是出自一位母亲和妻子之手。它有令人心碎的敏感歌词，以原声方式写下她孩子们的名字，夏奇拉在试图走出人生的黑暗阶段时表现出脆弱和力量的混合体。我认为“Acróstico”有机会。

Roiz：我想说“Ella Baila Sola”和“Un x100to”应该获胜，原因你们都提到了。墨西哥地方音乐已经度过了如此重要的时刻，那么这种流派怎么能不赢得年度歌曲呢？但《TQG》对我来说也很重要，因为每次我听到这首歌，我都会想到现在的女性听这首歌是多么重要，因为它充满了力量。这不是我们成长过程中所听的歌曲类型，它的主题更加顺从。

法哈多：我觉得“NASA”获胜的可能性很大。尽管卡米洛、亚历杭德罗·桑斯和埃德加·巴雷拉都是可爱的人，但这首歌在讲故事方面却很出色。我也希望夏奇拉和比扎拉普能够获胜——他们创作这首歌的方式令人难以置信。

最佳新人艺术家

博尔哈

神圣联系

安娜·德尔·卡斯蒂略

娜塔莎·法尔考

大风

保拉·关什

华金纳

莱昂·莱顿

马雷

蒂莫

弗洛雷斯：我认为这是一个很好的最佳新艺术家类别。大多数提名的艺术家实际上都是超级新人。我认为盖尔应该获胜。首先，她一直是主要艺术家的词曲作者——这对她有帮助——现在她正在为自己作为一名唱片艺术家创造一个空间。她作为歌手和词曲作者都有才华。她的声音也非常不同——她可以演奏流行、摇滚、民谣、都市音乐。她非常多元化，我喜欢她带来的东西。

Cobo： GALE 为很多知名人士编写的软件是一个很大的优势。她和很多编剧和制片人在一起，很多人投票，这将对她有利。

拉特纳-阿里亚斯：我介于盖尔和华金纳之间。盖尔似乎是一位出色的艺术家——去年我们在拉丁音乐周的音乐会上看到了她，她在那里影响了我。她还为很多人创作过作品，所以她有能力，有外表，她拥有成为超级艺术家的一切，她会走得很远。但该奖项将颁给华金纳。自从她在与环球影业签约之前从胡里奥·雷耶斯·科佩洛的艺术工作室崭露头角以来，我对她讲述影响她这一代人的深刻主题的故事的能力印象深刻，她的抒情和音乐敏感性超越了她的年龄。

胡安·路易斯·格拉有一天告诉我，“你听说过华金纳吗？”因为他知道我是委内瑞拉人。他对她印象深刻，并告诉我她让他想起了夏奇拉的开始。我觉得她与她这一代人有联系，她的演出中的女孩们唱得尽兴。她有一种甜蜜、魅力和真诚，这在如此肤浅的外表中是必要的。她的歌词表达了夏奇拉在她刚开始的时候所唱过的同样的爱，歌词要深刻得多。

Roiz：我希望看到 GALE 获得这个奖项。我记得两年前我们在洛杉矶参加了一次 WhatsApp 晚餐，庆祝妇女历史月，我坐在她旁边，那就是我遇见她的地方。她告诉我，她对开始自己的音乐事业感到非常紧张。她的一切——从她的个性到她关于不请自来的 D-pics 的歌词（这是她这一代人所面对的事情）——都很诚实，我喜欢这一点，她就像现代的艾薇儿·拉维尼（Avril Lavigne），一个能够适应的摇滚女孩。任何类型。我希望她能赢。我也很喜欢 Leon Leiden，因为他非常有创新精神。他也很令人耳目一新，但我不认为他会赢。

Raygoza：当我在纽约看到GALE现场演唱时，我印象非常深刻。她让我想起了 90 年代的女性摇滚歌手。她有这样的本质——她的表达、她的自信。她非常酷而且非常讨人喜欢。我希望看到的另一位提名者是安娜·德尔·卡斯蒂略（Ana del Castillo）。她的声音很有力量，在vallenato流派中非常有前途。她已经在这一类型中崭露头角并拥有自己的轨迹，而且她拥有非常强硬的性格。她性感但坚强，可以和男孩们一起出去玩。我喜欢女性用坚韧的性格来表现出她的坏脾气。无论是盖尔还是安娜，如果能获奖就很酷了。

法哈多：我喜欢盖尔。她获胜的机会非常大。我和伊莎贝拉一起谈论安娜·德尔·卡斯蒂略，因为她是唯一代表她这一流派的女性。她可能有点太性感了，但她就是女版的vallenato 。但我不确定她是否有真正获胜的机会。

Monday Night Football: Games, Dates & Time

Monday Night Football kicked off on Sept. 11 and will continue into January 2024. The MNF kickoff games between the Jets and Buffalo Bills drew a record-breaking 22.6 million viewers making it the most watched MNF game in history beating out the previous record-holder, a 2009's game between the Packers and Vikings.

Meanwhile, NFL ratings have received a boost as of late thanks to Taylor Swift . Although Swift missed a few games including a recent Chiefs vs. Dolphins matchup in Germany, she has been showing support for new flame Travis Kelce even from afar. The pop star threw a reported watch party at her New York City apartment on Nov. 5 and her support may have paid off because the Chiefs beat the Dolphins 21-14.

Swift has been spotted cheering on Kelce at several home games including a Thursday Night Football game in October. And she could be making an appearance at an upcoming Monday Night Football game later this month to watch Travis and the Chiefs face his brother, Jason Kelce, and the Philadelphia Eagles, although it might be wishful thinking since she's back on tour.

The Chiefs vs. Eagles game will take place on Nov. 20 at Arrowhead Stadium in Kansas City, Mo. (get tickets here ) and will air on ESPN, ABC and stream on ESPN+ .

Tickets for the game are in high-demand. Currently, the cheapest tickets are priced at around $338, while the most expensive tickets cost more $1,800. Tickets are selling fast, so if you want to be there in person, it's best to grab your tickets early (save $10 off eligible purchases of $250+ at Seat Geek with code: BILLBOARD10. Valid on first purchase only).

Fans who want to watch live, either from home or on-the-go, can stream select NFL games on ESPN+ including the aforementioned Eagles vs. Chiefs game next month and Green Bay vs. Giants on Dec. 11. The Chiefs are scheduled to play another MNF game on Dec. 18 against the New England Patriots — the game will air on ESPN and stream live on ESPN+.

Lastly, the second-to-last MNF game of the year will be the Baltimore Ravens vs. San Francisco 49ers on Dec. 25 at Levi Stadium in Santa Clara Calif. The Christmas Day game will air live on ABC and ESPN and stream on ESPN+. If you'd rather watch the Christmas game live from the stadium alongside thousands of fans, click here to get your tickets early. Tickets start at $92 .

Christmas Day will be packed with three NFL games on the schedule, including the Giants vs. Eagles airing at 4:30 pm ET on Fox and Chiefs vs. Las Vegas Raiders airing at 1 pm ET on CBS .

Speaking of the holidays, the Dallas Cowboys will face the Washington Commanders in a Thanksgiving Game slated for Thursday, Nov. 23 (get tickets here ). The final MNF game of the year will be played on Dec. 30 between the Detroit Lions and Cowboys.

Dolly Parton will headline the halftime show, the country legend announced on Oct. 16. “We're going to do some stuff that everybody can sing along to,” Parton told CBS This Morning’s Norah O'Donnell. “They'll know the songs I'm doing. … I want people to be surprised and enjoy it.”

The Cowboys vs. Commanders game will air on Nov. 23 at 4:30 pm ET on CBS and stream on Paramount+.

If you haven't already noticed, MNF sounds a bit different this season. That's because ESPN enlisted the help of Timbaland and Justin Timberlake to curate the music for select MNF games .

In September, the NFL debuted the official MNF theme featuring Chris Stapleton, Snoop Dogg and Cindy Blackman Santana. The song is a cover of Phil Collins “In the Air Tonight.”

The remaining MNF matchups for this season will include the Bears vs. Vikings, Broncos vs. Bills, 49ers vs. Ravens, Chiefs vs. Patriots and Lions vs. Cowboys. Click here to get tickets to see your favorite NFL games in person .

Marvel fans were able to catch the final trailer for The Marvels , which premiered during last Monday’s game. The film hit theaters on Nov. 10.

Want to stream MNF from outside of the US? With ExpressVPN , NordVPN and PureVPN you can access several streaming platforms and channels.

See the full 2023 MNF schedule here .

2023年11月13日

The Billboard Global 200 and Billboard Global Excl. US charts, which began in September 2020, rank songs based on streaming and sales activity culled from more than 200 territories around the world, as compiled by Luminate. The Global 200 is inclusive of worldwide data and the Global Excl. US chart comprises data from territories excluding the United States.

Chart ranks are based on a weighted formula incorporating official-only streams on both subscription and ad-supported tiers of audio and video music services, as well as download sales, the latter of which reflect purchases from full-service digital music retailers from around the world, with sales from direct-to-consumer (D2C) sites excluded from the charts' calculations.

Jung Kook in Good 'Standing' Atop Global 200, Beatles Top 10

Jung Kook's “Standing Next to You” starts at No. 1 on the Billboard Global 200, with 81.6 million streams and 121,000 sold worldwide Nov. 3-9, following its Nov. 3 release. (In addition to its original version, seven mixes of the song arrived Nov. 6: its Future Funk, Holiday, Latin Trap, PBR&B and Slow Jam remixes and its Band Version and instrumental version.)

Jung Kook, from South Korea, earns his third Global 200 No. 1, and the third solo leader for a BTS member; it's the first with no accompanying acts. Here's a rundown, ranked by peak position, of BTS members' 10 Global 200 top 10s outside the act, with BTS as a group having tallied 11 top 10s, including seven No. 1s:

  • “Standing Next to You,” Jung Kook , No. 1 (one week to date), November 2023
  • “3D,” Jung Kook & Jack Harlow, No. 1 (one week), October 2023
  • “Seven,” Jung Kook feat. Latto, No. 1 (seven weeks), July 2023
  • “Like Crazy,” Jimin , No. 2, April 2023
  • “Slow Dancing,” V , No. 4, September 2023
  • “Left and Right,” Charlie Puth feat. Jung Kook, No. 5, July 2022
  • “That That,” PSY feat. SUGA , No. 5, May 2022
  • “Set Me Free, Pt. 2,” Jimin, No. 8, April 2023
  • “Dreamers (Music From the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022),” Jung Kook, No. 9, December 2022
  • “The Astronaut,” Jin , No. 10, November 2022

Jung Kook's “Seven” rebounds 10-2 on the Global 200; Tate McRae's “Greedy” returns to its No. 3 high from No. 7; Taylor Swift's “Is It Over Now? (Taylor's Version) [From the Vault]” falls to No. 4 a week after it debuted at No. 1 ; and Doja Cat's “Paint the Town Red” rises 8-5 after four weeks at the summit.

The Beatles blast 152-10 on the Global 200 with “Now and Then,” with 37.6 million streams and 42,000 sold worldwide Nov. 3-9, following its Nov. 2 release. The song debuted a week earlier with 6.4 million streams and 30,000 sold in its first day. A 12-minute film chronicling the track premiered Nov. 2 , while the song's official video premiered Nov. 3 .

The Beatles Blast to No. 1 in UK With 'Now and Then'

2023年11月13日

“Now and Then” (the Fab Four's first entry since the Global 200 began) is billed as the final Beatles song, first recorded as a demo in 1977 by John Lennon and initially intended for the band's three-edition Anthology series in the mid-'90s before being shelved. The song was completed at last by surviving members Paul McCartney and Ringo Starr, among others, after new technology helped extract Lennon's vocals from the original demo, while George Harrison guitar parts from the initial attempt to finish the track were also incorporated into the song.

Jung Kook No. 1 on Global Excl. US, The Beatles No. 9

Jung Kook's “Standing Next to You” concurrently opens at No. 1 on the Billboard Global Excl. US chart, with 71.2 million streams and 44,000 sold outside the US in its first week.

As on the Global 200, Jung Kook claims his third No. 1 and the third solo Global Excl. US leader for a BTS member (and the first with no accompanying artists). Here's a recap, ranked by peak position, of BTS members' 14 Global Excl. US top 10s outside the group, while BTS totals 11 top 10s, including seven No. 1s:

  • “Standing Next to You,” Jung Kook , No. 1 (one week to date), November 2023
  • “3D,” Jung Kook & Jack Harlow, No. 1 (one week), October 2023
  • “Seven,” Jung Kook feat. Latto, No. 1 (nine weeks), July 2023
  • “Like Crazy,” Jimin , No. 2, April 2023
  • “Left and Right,” Charlie Puth feat. Jung Kook, No. 2, July 2022
  • “That That,” PSY feat. SUGA , No. 2, May 2022
  • “Slow Dancing,” V , No. 4, September 2023
  • “Dreamers (Music From the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022),” Jung Kook, No. 4, December 2022
  • “Love Me Again,” V, No. 6, August 2023
  • “The Astronaut,” Jin , No. 6, November 2022
  • “Rainy Days,” V, No. 8, August 2023
  • “Set Me Free, Pt. 2,” Jimin, No. 8, April 2023
  • “Stay Alive,” Jung Kook, No. 8, February 2022
  • “Vibe,” TAEYANG feat. Jimin, No. 9, January 2023

Jung Kook's “Seven” holds at No. 2 on the Global Excl. US chart; Iñigo Quintero's “Si No Estás” dips to No. 3 after two weeks in the lead; Tate McRae's “Greedy” retreats to No. 4 from its No. 3 high; and Jung Kook and Jack Harlow's “3D” rebounds 11-5.

Plus, The Beatles debut at No. 9 with their first Global Excl. US hit as “Now and Then” begins with 27.1 million streams and 26,000 sold outside the US Nov. 3-9.

The Billboard Global 200 and Billboard Global Excl. US charts (dated Nov. 18, 2023) will update on Billboard.com Tuesday (Nov. 14). For both charts, the top 100 titles are available to all readers on Billboard.com, while the complete 200-title rankings are visible on Billboard Pro, Billboard ’s subscription-based service. For all chart news, you can follow @billboard and @billboardcharts on both X, formerly known as Twitter, and Instagram.

Ariana Grande and Ethan Slater are seemingly still going strong.

The duo attended a performance of Gutenberg! The Musical! on Broadway on Sunday night (Nov. 12), and the show's star Andrew Rannells took to Instagram to share some backstage photos with the attendees, which also included Michael Urie. “We had some big fun in Schlimmer yesterday,” Rannells captioned his post, in which Grande is seen on the third slide posing alongside Slater, Rannells and Urie. “Spamalot's Ethan Slater AND Michael Urie! Two great guys to eat dreams with. Plus Ariana Grande! It was a perfect Sunday. Go see Spamalot!”

See his post here .

Earlier this month, Grande was spotted at the St. James Theatre in New York City to support her rumored boyfriend Slater in the first preview performance of Broadway's Spamalot revival. In an Instagram video shared by user Jim Glaub, who was in the audience, Grande is seen smiling and cheering from the audience.

Reports surfaced back in July that Grande is dating her 31-year-old Wicked costar following her recently reported split from husband Dalton Gomez. Both TMZ and People reported that he and Grande started dating after both of their relationships were over. Slater was previously married to singer Lilly Jay, and the two celebrated their four-year wedding anniversary in November 2022.

Grande plays Glinda opposite Cynthia Erivo's Elphaba in Jon M. Chu's upcoming live-action film adaptation of the Broadway show Wicked , which will be split into two parts. The movie was initially meant to hit theaters on Christmas Day of next year (Dec. 25, 2024). Wicked Part 1 is now set to be released next Thanksgiving (Nov. 27, 2024).

; Every Solo Song by a BTS Member to Chart on the Billboard Hot 100 https://www.billboard.com/lists/bts-solo-members-hot-100-chart-history/ Mon, 13 Nov 2023 19:25:49 +0000 Chart BeatMusicK-PopMusic NewsPop https://www.billboard.com/?post_type=pmc_list&p=1235400506 All seven BTS members have sent solo entries onto the survey.

BTS is one of the most successful acts in Billboard chart history.

Dating to the South Korean septet's first appearance on the Billboard Hot 100 in 2017 with “DNA,” the group has charted more than two dozen songs. Of those, 10 have reached the top 10 and six have gone all the way to No. 1: “Dynamite” (three weeks at the summit in 2020); “Savage Love (Laxed – Siren Beat)” with Jawsh 685 and Jason Derulo (one week, 2020); “Life Goes On” (one week, 2020); “Butter” (10 weeks, 2021); “Permission to Dance” (one week, 2021); and “My Universe” with Coldplay (one week, 2021).

Outside the group, all seven BTS members have embarked on solo careers – and scored solo Hot 100 hits. Two — Jimin and Jung Kook — have even achieved solo No. 1s, with “Like Crazy” and “Seven” (featuring Latto), respectively.

J-Hope became the first BTS member to notch a solo Hot 100 entry when “Chicken Noodle Soup” featuring Becky G debuted and peaked at No. 81 in October 2019. SUGA was next (under his Agust D moniker) with “Daechwita” in 2020, followed by V (“Christmas Tree,” January 2022), Jung Kook (“Stay Alive,” February 2022), JIN (“The Astronaut,” November 2022), RM (“Wild Flower” with Youjeen, December 2022) and Jimin (“Vibe” with TAEYANG, January 2023).

As each member extends BTS' imprint with subsequent solo songs, here's a look at all seven members' solo histories on the Hot 100 (along with a look at all of BTS' entries), each listed chronologically as of the chart dated Nov. 18, 2023.

; Jason Aldean & Kid Rock to Headline Small-Town Festival Series Rock the Country https://www.billboard.com/music/country/jason-aldean-kid-rock-rock-the-country-headliners-1235470488/Dave Brooks Mon, 13 Nov 2023 19:21:57 +0000 CountryMusicMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235470488 The seven-city shows will also feature Miranda Lambert, Lynyrd Skynyrd and more.

Small towns have long played an outsized role in American songwriting, often serving as waypoint between past and present, a place that that some characters leave, others yearn to return and many are left behind.

For country singer Jason Aldean , the intricate details of life in a small town — from beer runs at the local Amoco station to the smell of White Rain hairspray at a Friday football game — have led to some of the genres most commercially successful songs in the past two decade. Songs such as “Night Train” — a love story about a man who stays connected to his hometown through sound of passing freight trains, or “Amarillo Sky,” which honors a humble farmer whose connection to his family is threatened by drought.

When it comes to documenting life in the “Fly Over States,” Aldean is an unrivaled talent and an obvious choice to headline the inaugural Rock the Country festival series, a traveling country music series spread out across seven small American towns in the Southeast US Produced by Alabama-based producer Shane Quick of LiveCo — creator of the long-running Rock the South country festival in Cullman, Alabama — and Nathan Baugh, president, 46 Entertainment, the festival will also feature headliner Kid Rock on all seven stops and special guests such as Miranda Lambert, Hank Williams Jr., Lynyrd Skynyrd, Koe Wetzel, Brantley Gilbert, Travis Tritt and many more who will appear at different stops on the Rock the Country tour.

Aldean will be joined on the tour by co-headliner Kid Rock . Quick insists the tour is not political, but it's booking of one of former president Donald Trump's biggest boosters, and its timing months before the election injects an unavoidable dose amount of political energy into the tour that will be impossible to ignore.

Through Rock the Country, which launches at the Lamar-Dixon Expo Center in Gonzalez, La., on April 5 and 6, Aldean has a rare opportunity to speak to the serious challenges rural America faces over the next few years. First, as the controversy surrounding Aldean's 2023 song “Try That in a Small Town” demonstrates, it can be difficult for rural America to express itself collectively to the country's urban populations, and it can also be difficult for some living in major population centers to listen and not be patronizing in their response.

Could the controversy have been avoided had Aldean's song been a little lighter on the rhetoric? Maybe, but once the conversation becomes a word-for-word litigation over intent and historical context, it becomes difficult to find middle ground.

And yet finding commonality is probably the most effective way to deal with major challenges facing rural communities, like the closure of more than 600 rural hospitals in the near future, according to a recent study by the Center for Healthcare Quality and Payment Reform . Rural communities have also been much harder hit by major economic downturns, leading to higher and longer rates of joblessness and unemployment during recessions.

Whatever direction Aldean decides to, Rock the Country is a rare opportunity for the artist to lift up rural America, and a rare chance for his fans and fans of country music to travel to small towns and celebrate together.

Dates and locations for Rock the Country are listed below. To learn more and buy tickets, visit rockthecountry.com .

  • Gonzalez, La. – April 5 & 6 at Lamar-Dixon Expo Center
  • Ashland, Ky. – April 19 & 20 at Boyd County Fairgrounds
  • Rome, Ga. – May 10 & 11 at Kingston Downs
  • Ocala, Fla – June 7 & 8 at Majestic Oaks Ocala
  • Mobile, Ala. – June 21 & 22 at The Grounds
  • Poplar Bluff, M. – June 28 & 29 at Brick's Offroad Parks
  • Anderson, SC – July 26 & 27 at Anderson Sports and Entertainment Center
; R. Kelly Sues Federal Prison Bureau for Allegedly Leaking Private Info to YouTube Host https://www.billboard.com/business/legal/r-kelly-sues-federal-prison-bureau-illegal-leaks-youtube-host-1235470645/Bill Donahue Mon, 13 Nov 2023 19:14:52 +0000 BusinessLegal NewsLegalTasha K https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235470645 The singer claims the feds illegally shared "sensitive" jailhouse info with a gossip blogger named Tasha K — yes, that Tasha K.;

R. Kelly is suing the federal Bureau of Prisons over allegations that the agency leaked private information about the disgraced singer to social media personality Tasha K — the same YouTube gossip host that Cardi B sued for defamation last year.

In a complaint filed Monday (Nov. 13) in Chicago federal court, Kelly's lawyers say an unnamed Bureau of Prisons (BOP) agent illegally accessed Kelly's digital prison records — including recordings of private phone calls with his girlfriend and lawyers — and sold them to Tasha, who then broadcast them online to more than 1 million followers.

“The defendant United States of America breached its duty of care to the plaintiff when it allowed countless BOP officers to access plaintiff's confidential information without any legal basis to do so,” Kelly's lawyer Jennifer Bonjean writes.

The lawsuit, which also names Tasha K (Latasha Kebe) as a defendant, claims that the influencer then “rallied her massive following to harass the plaintiff with the use of the stolen information and created chaos in plaintiff's personal life.”

The leaks left Kelly “isolated and fearful to communicate with his attorneys or other third parties,” the lawsuit claims, because he knew it could be “released to the general public for mass exploitation.”

Kelly was convicted in 2021 on racketeering and sex trafficking charges stemming from accusations that he orchestrated a long-running scheme to abuse women. In September 2022, he was convicted in Chicago on separate federal charges of child pornography and enticement of minors for sex. The singer, who is currently appealing both convictions, was later sentenced to 30 years in prison .

If Kebe's name sounds familiar, it should. Last year, Cardi Bwon a $3.9 million defamation judgment against the blogger over false statements Kebe made about drug use, STDs and prostitution on her YouTube channel “UnWinewithTashaK.” Kebe has since filed for federal bankruptcy , citing her inability to pay that huge judgment.

In his new lawsuit, Kelly claims that Kebe first published private information in November 2019, starting with a video called “R. Kelly Can't Control his Girlfriends while Behind Bars” that contained information Kebe said came from a “phone tap somewhere.” Later posts allegedly divulged more personal information, including highly-sensitive communications with his legal team.

“The communications … related to personal and family problems, romantic interests, health problems, literacy issues, and issues related to the defense of his pending criminal cases,” Kelly's lawyers write.

According to the lawsuit, an internal BOP investigation revealed that an unnamed officer had pulled Kelly's records from the agency's TruView system, a digital database of information on prisoners. The officer then allegedly scanned them and “emailed that scan to third parties, including defendant Kebe.” But that probe ended without any action against the officer, Kelly's lawyers claim.

“No charges were brought against defendant BOP Officer A, and the government has refused to reveal any details about the investigation including the identity of Officer A,” Bonjean wrote in Monday's complaint. “In short, there has been a cover-up of the rampant BOP misconduct that is ongoing.”

Kelly's lawyers claim that illegal leaks continued even after the BOP was made aware of the initial disclosures to Kebe. They cited a report last summer by the Washington Post about Kelly's $25,000 in commissary funds — a report that resulted in federal prosecutors seizing the money to pay off his victims .

In technical legal terms, Kelly's lawyers allege that the leaks amounted to negligence, an invasion of his privacy, an intentional infliction of emotional distress, civil theft and civil conspiracy. They also claim that the officer who stole the records violated the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act — a federal statute that makes computer hacking illegal.

A spokesperson for the BOP declined to comment, citing agency policy on pending litigation. An attorney who has represented Tasha K on other matters did not immediately return a request for comment.

; Fall Out Boy & My Chemical Romance to Headline When We Were Young Festival: See 2024 Lineup https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/when-we-were-young-2024-lineup-1235470523/Hannah Dailey Mon, 13 Nov 2023 18:56:14 +0000 MusicMusic NewsfestivalsrockWhen We Were Young Festival https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235470523 A Day to Remember, Jimmy Eat World and Pierce the Veil are also on the bill.

My Chemical Romance and Fall Out Boy are the top headliners on When We Were Young festival's 2024 lineup, which was announced Monday (Nov. 13).

The annual punk rock summit will return for a third year to the Las Vegas Festival Grounds, kicking off Oct. 19, 2024. Also on the bill with MCR and FOB are A Day to Remember, Jimmy Eat World, Pierce the Veil, The Used, Simple Plan, Dashboard Confessional and dozens more.

The festival also promises that each group will perform an album in full, with highlights including My Chemical Romance's The Black Parade , Jimmy Eat World's Bleed American and A Day to Remember's Homesick .

Fans can sign up for tickets now on When We Were Young's website to receive an access code for the 10 am presale on Friday (Nov. 17). If there are still spots left after the presale, remaining tickets will go on sale to the general public later that day at 2 pm PT.

“Now Come One, Come All To This Tragic Affair………………,” wrote My Chemical Romance on the band's Instagram page, sharing a poster for the festival.

Fall Out Boy also shared the poster to Instagram , writing, “headlining next year's @whenwewereyoungfest see ya then Vegas ✌️”

The 2024 dates mark When We Were Young's third year in Vegas, with MCR and Paramore headlining its inaugural festival there in 2022. Last year, Blink-182 and Green Day headlined the bill , which also included 5 Seconds of Summer, All Time Low, 30 Seconds to Mars, Good Charlotte, The Offspring, Something Corporate, Yellowcard and more.
